alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Harding County; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 24 at 3:36AM MST until January 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Curry County, Quay County, Roosevelt County, Harding County, and Union County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing fog is possible in portions of Union and Harding counties this morning where temperatures may drop below freezing. Slick spots may develop on bridges and overpasses as well as other exposed surfaces.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; Harding County; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Union County
